The trip to the Ark was largely uneventful and relatively short. As
they moved across the broken terrain they drove past were it looked as
if a massive battle of some sort had taken place some time ago. This
is obviously were the minions had made their attack on the Ark several
months ago. Only now was the scorched ground begining to heal as weeds
and different wild grasses were begining to peak out from beneath the
rocky grounds.

The Ark is as Tuscon and the rest left it. Even for Perceptor, the Ark
has not changed appreciatively since the last scans he had recieved
from it. A broken ship lying partial entoumbed in the side of a mid
sized mountain.

As Tuscon and those that were with him approached the Ark the Ark
computer voice could be heard, "Predacon signature detected." The Ark
shields snapped into place as the base went on alert and weapons began
to target Tuscon . . . or perhaps someone he's carrying.

(TAG)

Preston
